content: this small crochet tapestry pattern is based around the instantly recognisable symbol from berserk this is a perfect gift for a fan of the hugely popular anime/manga berserk and can be used for wall décor cushions bags etc tapestry size 7 25 inches w x 7 5 inches l notes this pattern is made to measure in english us terminology beginner level single_crochet only in pdf form with colour block instructions and a graph to choose from materials dk yarn in black under 50 g dk yarn in red under 15 g 3 50 mm crochet hook measuring tape scissors darning needles copyright please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are property of stephthestitchbish this pattern is for personal use only and should not be altered/sold/distributed in any way i d love to see your creations and share them so be sure to tag me on my instagram @steph thestitchbish and tag #berserkcrochettapestry to be featured
